replies.body:
Wowzers, Well howdy there Liz. You're a very nice and beautiful human being. You're probably one of my closest mineman friends. Anyways, you're a living legend and I honestly feel comfortable going to you if I ever need help with things and when I am feeling down because you always know how to make mehz laugh.

Now onto the chicken nuggets, as you can see in this picture below they're oddly shaped and can't 2v1 the hulk.
